FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command clears statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics { interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-num> } | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of a interface.
-

Clears statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses on all interfaces.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses, run the reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command.
Precautions
Exercise caution when using this command.
